address.streetAddress: Blvd. Alvaro Obregon # 261

275148963.name: Not a place for good deals
275148963.author: a TripAdvisor user
275148963.reviewBody: I didn\'t see any good deals or even better prices here than you would find in a regular Mexican mall.  Better off going elsewhere.

address.streetAddress: Blvd. Alvaro Obregon # 261

273167251.name: Go to Mulza Outlets instead
273167251.author: a TripAdvisor user
273167251.reviewBody:
I ended up exploring Plaza del Zapato and the whole surrounding area. There are lots of shoes and bags, mostly synthetic and not very modern. 

A friend told me Plaza del Zapato was the old area, head to Mulza Outlets. It was GREAT with 100's of shoe shops- men's, women's and children's, sporting, fashion, business and cowboy boots.

I picked up some fantastic shoes and some great bargains. Well worth the trip!

address.streetAddress: Blvd. Alvaro Obregon # 261

226700337.name: So Much More to See and Experience
226700337.author: a TripAdvisor user
226700337.reviewBody: This small to medium sized leather products mall sits on the main intersection entering the very large Zona Piel.  The shops are your basic corporate style without much character.  From our experience, shopping the "zona" is more fun and has a great deal more character.

address.streetAddress: Blvd. Alvaro Obregon # 261

172726023.name: Nice shoe mall!
172726023.author: a TripAdvisor user
172726023.reviewBody: I think it is a nice place to shop for leather shoes and accessories. I also have to mention that you have to have the time to look around and compare prices. I spent about two hours in here and I did not get to go to every store I wanted to go (because they were about to close). Also, I remember seeing many stores that offer many pretty, sophisticated and modern styles for men, women and children contrary to what another reviewer mentioned about seeing only cowboy boots. I also saw some of the reviews mention that you can walk up two streets and find another mall with shoes and leather goods, yes it is true! but you have to be aware that many of those shops sell counterfeit items. A few years ago this same mall was being bombarded by outside companies (mostly the ones that manufacture in China) and thus they were selling lower quality and many times counterfeit products to tourists. The locals complained about it to the government given the fact that Le\u00f3n is known for its leather products, especially its boots. If you are looking to spend less money then I would suggest going to the neighboring towns, like Celaya. But do not go to the street vendors, most of them will give you a ridiculous price which of course is too good to be true. Personally I bought from the Plaza del Zapato because I knew I was getting genuine leather and I also feel good helping the local and state manufacturers.

address.streetAddress: Blvd. Alvaro Obregon # 261

139004403.name: Dont bother unless you want cowboy boots
139004403.author: a TripAdvisor user
139004403.reviewBody:
The whole first floor is cowboy boots! Literally, 30 stores selling nothing but cowboy boots or some type of leather shoe. Walk around the corner and go to a side street vendor an save 66%

Pick me up two pair of cowboy boots one pair of Don Chuy rattlesnake (1100 pesos) in Celaya and the other pair was ostrich skin which i purchased iin león for 960 pesos.

My opinion is don't waste your time here.

address.streetAddress: Blvd. Alvaro Obregon # 261

117915644.name: We were disappointed
117915644.author: a TripAdvisor user
117915644.reviewBody: Sure it was a two story mall with nothing but shoe stores and a couple selling leather accessories, but we found it sterile and lacking the character of the adjoining Zona Piel.  The stores reminded us of just a concentration of shoe stores found in most any mall.  When one leaves the mall and walks the square mile or so with literally 1000\'s of shops selling leather goods, you get the true picture of the leather business in Mexico!\n\nWe had visited the Zona Piel briefly two years ago and there was a noticeable lack of counterfeit merchandise that was so prevalent two years ago.  Gone were the Nascar, NFL, MLB, Disney, Looney Tunes, etc jackets.  I had read articles in the Mexican media that the Mexican Government had been cleaning it up and saw with my own eyes that this was true.

address.streetAddress: Blvd. Alvaro Obregon # 261

59698272.name: Shopping center with only shoes
59698272.author: a TripAdvisor user
59698272.reviewBody: Leon is a large city but with a nice downtown and a really beautiful main plaza. Near the bus station which is at least a mile (2 kms) from the downtown is the Plaza del Zapato which is a two story shopping mall with only shoe stores. They have men\'s shoes, women\'s shoes, athletic shoes, bargains, etc. Across the street is another mall with two floors (Plaza de Piel) with only leather goods. They have purses, billfolds, jackets, belts, and more. And in the same general area of these two malls and the bus station there are dozens (maybe hundreds) of shops that also sell shoes and leather goods. We spent a couple of hours wandering through both malls and many of the shops. Leon is the shoe and leather manufacturing center in Mexico.

address.streetAddress: Blvd. Alvaro Obregon # 261

566717971.name: Padrisima Galeria  Incre\u00edble Galeria lo mejor en Leon y muchos lugares de Mexico
566717971.author: a TripAdvisor user
566717971.reviewBody: Excelente Galeria impresiona todos los art\u00edculos qu\u00e9 hay, pinturas, porcelanas y antig\u00fcedades hermosas y de excelente gusto.  La recomiendo para embellecer tu hogar con un gusto exquisito

address.streetAddress: Valle de Bravo 117, Valle del Campestre A una cuadra de parque Panorama

566281380.name: Me gusta y mucho
566281380.author: a TripAdvisor user
566281380.reviewBody: Esta galer\u00eda es magn\u00edfica. No se si sea la mejor de la zona pero super\u00f3 mis expectativas. Precios buenos y piezas incre\u00edbles. No dejen de ir.

address.streetAddress: Valle de Bravo 117, Valle del Campestre A una cuadra de parque Panorama

496687564.name: Padrisima Galeria
496687564.author: a TripAdvisor user
496687564.reviewBody: Excelente Galeria impresiona todos los art\u00edculos qu\u00e9 hay, pinturas, porcelanas y antig\u00fcedades hermosas y de excelente gusto.  La recomiendo para embellecer tu hogar con un gusto exquisito

address.streetAddress: Valle de Bravo 117, Valle del Campestre A una cuadra de parque Panorama

496681120.name: Un museo donde puedes comprar
496681120.author: a TripAdvisor user
496681120.reviewBody: Excelente galer\u00eda con obras de arte desde milenarias hasta hace unos cuantos cientos de a\u00f1os. El due\u00f1o te explica cada una de las piezas as\u00ed como su procedencia.  Para que ir a una muebler\u00eda o tienda de decoraciones cuando puedes comprar objetos \u00fanicos. Compr\u00e9 unos caballos de carrusel italianos del siglo XIX

address.streetAddress: Valle de Bravo 117, Valle del Campestre A una cuadra de parque Panorama

493309014.name: Execelte lugar !!!
493309014.author: a TripAdvisor user
493309014.reviewBody: Un lugar unico donde encontrar\u00e1s las mejores antig\u00fcedades de todos los rincones del mundo. Un servicio y una atenci\u00f3n exc\u00e9lente!!

address.streetAddress: Valle de Bravo 117, Valle del Campestre A una cuadra de parque Panorama

588971080.name: Little Gem in the center of Leon
588971080.author: a TripAdvisor user
588971080.reviewBody: If you are lucky enough to find yourself in downtown Leon you owe it to yourself to visit this place. It is free entrance and it houses a host of diverse exhibitions permanent and temporary. Just walking in the building will take your breath away. Can you believe this used to be a jail?

address.streetAddress: Calle Justo Sierra # 202 Belisario Dominguez

488235022.name: Company event
488235022.author: a TripAdvisor user
488235022.reviewBody: Had a great time racing against my friends and boss. For a company event to.push competition and ambience really great.\nHad a great time... do not expect much from the "eating" options still you are not there to eat rather have fun and race.

address.streetAddress: Carretera a Santa Ana Del Conde Km 1.5

437646582.name: Beautiful museum with interesting exhibits
437646582.author: a TripAdvisor user
437646582.reviewBody: This museum is located on the left side  of the Catedral Basilica de Leon. It has two beautiful courtyards and a very interesting collection of artifacts, for example, a picture "Santisima Virgen de la Luz" -- a masterpiece of  Miguel Cabrera -- the famous painter of Nueva Espa\u00f1a of the 18-th century. I also really liked the gallery with the angels and beautiful tapestries. The modern "Cristo Mexicano" gives an unusual interpretation of Christ.\nA ticket costs 15 pesos.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Hidalgo 202 Centro, beside the Metropolitan Cathedral of Leon

629621128.name: Tienes hambre y no quieres gastar mucho?
629621128.author: a TripAdvisor user
629621128.reviewBody:
Nos llevaron a comer a este sitio, la ventaja es que hay de todo tipo de comida, comida corrida, hamburguesas, comida china (Super), mariscos, mexicana, cafés y postres, tacos, carnes, y muchas cosas mas.
Existe una zona común con mesas, te sirven a tu mesa y la atención es muy buena.
Buena opción cuando no se ponen de acuerdo para comer, asi, cada quien elige lo que mas le gusta.
Los precios son muy económicos.
Al menos de lo que probamos todo estaba muy rico y abundante.
Además de comida hay muchos lcoales donde puedes efectuar compras, incluso de carnes, frutas y verduras.
Totalmente recomendable.

address.streetAddress: Juan Nepomuceno 914

565517638.name: A comer
565517638.author: a TripAdvisor user
565517638.reviewBody: Excelente espacio para comer, comprar accesorios o ropa, maquillaje, variedad de alimentos y bebidas

address.streetAddress: Juan Nepomuceno 914

529138890.name: Comida
529138890.author: a TripAdvisor user
529138890.reviewBody: Muy rico todo, amables limpio el lugar aunque no encontraba lugar de estacionamiento, leon es un lugar bello para visitar y conocer

address.streetAddress: Juan Nepomuceno 914

518120365.name: Lugar para comprar cosas locales
518120365.author: a TripAdvisor user
518120365.reviewBody: El mercado est\u00e1 muy bien yo me imaginaba algo m\u00e1s sucio pero no estaba muy limpio y organizado y pudimos dejar a nuestras en el area infantil mientras nos d\u00e1bamos la vuelta x el lugar eso si hab\u00eda varios puestos cerrados no hay donde especifiquen sus horarios

address.streetAddress: Juan Nepomuceno 914

468158473.name: Hay un local vegano muy rico
468158473.author: a TripAdvisor user
468158473.reviewBody: Comimos en el local vegano, la comida muy rica y a buen precio (comparado con muchos lugares org\u00e1nicos y/o vegetarianos-veganos). Ademas venden productos e ingredientes veganos

address.streetAddress: Juan Nepomuceno 914

456554846.name: Un lugar donde satisfaces tu antojo
456554846.author: a TripAdvisor user
456554846.reviewBody: Recomiendo este lugar por su limpieza , variaci\u00f3n ,y diferentes antojos q se venden adem\u00e1s de que los precios son baratos y comes muy rico , adem\u00e1s es un lugar familiar y con mucha armon\u00eda gastron\u00f3mica

address.streetAddress: Juan Nepomuceno 914

450174737.name: Una tradici\u00f3n que hay que conocer
450174737.author: a TripAdvisor user
450174737.reviewBody: Estos mercados son una tradici\u00f3n. Es muy interesante todo lo que ofrecen desde un gancho para el pelo hasta comida t\u00edpica. Si tiene tiempo vale la pena caminar entre los toldos.

address.streetAddress: Juan Nepomuceno 914

446179402.name: Muchos puestos cerrados
446179402.author: a TripAdvisor user
446179402.reviewBody: Se ve que hay variedad pero la mayor\u00eda de los negocios est\u00e1n cerrados, falta a veces calidad y muchos puestos no son del todo atractivos.

address.streetAddress: Juan Nepomuceno 914

421632127.name: Rico rico
421632127.author: a TripAdvisor user
421632127.reviewBody: Tiene estacionamiento gratuito en el techo del lugar. Aunque muchos locales estaban cerrados, la comida vegana est\u00e1 deliciosa.

address.streetAddress: Juan Nepomuceno 914

413667004.name: Plazeando
413667004.author: a TripAdvisor user
413667004.reviewBody: Excelente ubicaci\u00f3n, estacionamiento bueno pero hace falta m\u00e1s espacio, ideal para probar exquisitos platillos a muy bajo costo, sobretodo las ensaladas deliciosas, ideal lugar para ir de compras.

address.streetAddress: Juan Nepomuceno 914

402235059.name: Hay una tienda de vinos buenisima
402235059.author: a TripAdvisor user
402235059.reviewBody: Hay una tienda de vinos espa\u00f1oles  y quesos finos buen\u00edsima se llama la Manchega Le\u00f3n y est\u00e1 en el pasillo 6 local 143, vinos de excelente relaci\u00f3n precio calidad

address.streetAddress: Juan Nepomuceno 914

389284800.name: Buena opci\u00f3n para comer
389284800.author: a TripAdvisor user
389284800.reviewBody: Esta plaza comercial cuenta con una excelente \u00e1rea de comidas, ya que la variedad es muy amplia y los precios muy razonables, va desde un rico menudo, la tradicional comida corrida, pescados y mariscos, tortas, tostadas. En fin para todos los gustos.\nEn particular me gusta el local denominado El Bigos: excelente atenci\u00f3n, buen saz\u00f3n y costo muy accesible, recomendable la comida corrida en cualquiera de las combinaciones que sugieran los propietarios.\nAdem\u00e1s del \u00e1rea de comidas hay locales muy variados de ropa, artesan\u00edas, juguetes, zapatos , etc.

address.streetAddress: Juan Nepomuceno 914

137074669.author: a TripAdvisor user
137074669.reviewBody: Please do something about the grafitti, everywhere you go in the city is badly marked with grafitti,  topes, topes, topes, what can I say....Please keep removing them.

660220755.author: a TripAdvisor user
660220755.reviewBody: Es otro de los templos que por excelencia escogen los novios para realizar su enlace matrimonial .. por su arquitectura neogotica y por dentro parce ser muy colonial.....

address.streetAddress: Calle 20 de Enero

631795147.name: Bello sitio arquitect\u00f3nico de la ciudad
631795147.author: a TripAdvisor user
631795147.reviewBody: Un templo muy hermoso en pleno centro de la ciudad. Un lugar para visitar. Muy usado para celebraciones religiosas por su belleza

address.streetAddress: Calle 20 de Enero

614317746.name: Una parroquia muy concurrida
614317746.author: a TripAdvisor user
614317746.reviewBody: Al visitar esta iglesia, en el centro de la ciudad, me llam\u00f3 la atenci\u00f3n la cantidad de gente que hab\u00eda rezando y tambi\u00e9n los amplios horarios de misas. Se caracteriza por estar coronada por un pin\u00e1culo  que no se coloc\u00f3 hasta los a\u00f1os 50 del siglo XX, a pesar de que se comenz\u00f3 a construir en 1901 sobre los restos de la antigua "Santa Escuela" o "Compa\u00f1\u00eda Vieja" que construyeron los jesuitas en el siglo XVIII. Tiene hermosas vidrieras y un altar de m\u00e1rmol

address.streetAddress: Calle 20 de Enero

585356894.name: Misterioso y poco com\u00fan
585356894.author: a TripAdvisor user
585356894.reviewBody: Este es un templo cat\u00f3lico . Por parte de afuera pudiera parecer que no lo es pues la construcci\u00f3n es muy extra\u00f1a y se asemeja mas a un templo protestante o incluso a un mini castillo.  El interior es realmente bello. Sus vitrales son extraordinarios. El interior no es muy grande pero como lo dije antes te sorprender\u00e1 porque pareciera que estas en una sala de baile de esas que salen en las pel\u00edculas de princesas de disney.

address.streetAddress: Calle 20 de Enero

295027872.name: Nice!
295027872.author: a TripAdvisor user
295027872.reviewBody: This theatre is very nice and very convenient to visit and the added bonus is that it\'s located near other attractions. \n\nI definitely recommend it.
